name: Nasi Goreng
description: Indonesia's version of fried rice, cooked with sweet soy sauce, spices, and served with fried egg or satay.
caption: A flavorful fried rice loved by all Indonesians.

name: Rendang
description: A slow-cooked beef dish with rich coconut milk and spices, considered one of the most delicious foods in the world.
caption: Tender beef simmered in rich spices.

name: Sate Ayam
description: Grilled chicken skewers served with peanut sauce, often found in street stalls and restaurants.
caption: Juicy grilled skewers with nutty sauce.

name: Gado-Gado
description: A vegetable salad with peanut sauce, boiled eggs, and rice cakes.
caption: Indonesia's healthy salad with peanut twist.

name: Bakso
description: Meatball soup served with noodles, tofu, and vegetables in a savory broth.
caption: Warm comfort in a bowl of meatball soup.

name: Soto Ayam
description: A traditional chicken soup flavored with turmeric, served with vermicelli, eggs, and lime.
caption: Golden chicken soup with a tangy kick.

name: Nasi Padang
description: Steamed rice served with a variety of spicy dishes, curries, and fried specialties.
caption: A feast of flavors on one plate.

name: Pempek
description: Savory fish cakes served with sweet and tangy vinegar sauce.
caption: Chewy fish cakes with zesty sauce.

name: Rawon
description: Beef soup with a rich, dark broth flavored with keluak nuts.
caption: A deep, earthy beef soup from Java.

name: Ayam Betutu
description: Chicken slow-cooked with Balinese spices and wrapped in banana leaves.
caption: A Balinese delicacy full of aroma.

name: Gudeg
description: A sweet jackfruit stew cooked with coconut milk and palm sugar.
caption: Sweet and savory jackfruit specialty.

name: Coto Makassar
description: Traditional beef soup with rich spices, often served with ketupat rice cakes.
caption: Makassar's rich and spicy beef soup.

name: Kerak Telor
description: A savory omelet made with glutinous rice, egg, and fried shallots.
caption: Crispy Betawi-style rice omelet.

name: Martabak Manis
description: A thick sweet pancake filled with chocolate, cheese, and condensed milk.
caption: Sweet pancake with indulgent fillings.

name: Es Cendol
description: A refreshing iced dessert made with green rice flour jelly, coconut milk, and palm sugar syrup.
caption: Cool and sweet green jelly drink.

name: Es Teler
description: A fruit cocktail dessert with avocado, jackfruit, young coconut, and sweetened milk.
caption: A fruity ice dessert to beat the heat.

name: Ayam Penyet
description: Fried chicken smashed and served with spicy sambal, tofu, and tempeh.
caption: Crispy chicken with fiery sambal.

name: Bebek Goreng
description: Crispy fried duck served with sambal and rice.
caption: Golden crispy duck, a Javanese favorite.

name: Lontong Sayur
description: Rice cakes served in coconut milk vegetable stew.
caption: A hearty breakfast with coconut flavor.

name: Sop Buntut
description: An oxtail soup cooked with spices, vegetables, and clear broth.
caption: Rich and savory oxtail soup.
